001Q1.question: The first question I feal like I should ask for the sake of this text adventure is do you have autism? (Y or N)

001Q2.question: Now that we have gotten to know you a bit more lets get to makeing a friend shal we. You are in class alone you look over to see a some what cool looking dude named jack what do you do?

002Q2.question: You should proberbly go talk to him

001Q3.question: (tip you should as Jack his intrests) what do you do?

001Q4.question: Jack tells you about his love for Ori the owl house and heluva boss what do you do?

001Q5.question: Jack would like to test you on ori to see if your a true fan your first question is who is the villan of ori and the will of the wisps (note if you get any qustion wrong you will be sent back to the question that you got wrong)

001Q6.question: In ori and the will of wisps the abilty that alows you to reach serius hight by launching of enemys is?

001Q7.question: In ori and the will of the wisps which character causes ori to find the wisps

001Q8.question: jack is happy your a fellow Ori fan

004Q5.question: Jack would like to test you on your the owl house knowlage to see if your a real fan Your first question is Which of the following is a god? (note if you get any qustion wrong you will be sent back to the question that you got wrong)

004Q8.question: jack is happy your a fellow The owl house fan

005Q8.question: Jack is Happy your a fellow The Owl House lover a wants to be friend you

003Q4.question: You tell jack your intrested in pokemon so you to decide to do a pokemon battle your level 5 rowlet against his level 5 eevee what do you do

003Q5.question: Its a critical hit ending the battle. Jack thinks the battle was fun and is now ready to be friended what do you do?

001QEnd.question: Good Job you have made friends with jack (press enter to restart)
